mapper.select: SELECT ui.nickname as nickname, ub.price as price, ub.quantity as quantity, ub.finish_time as createTime, ub.user_buy_id as orderId, '1' as state FROM user_market_buy_history ub LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ub.purchase_uid = ui.uid WHERE ub.purchase_uid = #{uid} and ub.order_state = '6' OR ub.sell_uid = #{uid} and ub.order_state = '6' UNION SELECT ui.nickname as nickname, ut.price as userPrice, ut.quantity as userQuantity, ut.finish_time as createTime, ut.user_trade_id as orderId, '2' as state FROM user_market_trade_history ut LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ut.sell_uid = ui.uid WHERE ut.purchase_uid = #{uid} and ut.order_state = '4' OR ut.sell_uid = #{uid} and ut.order_state = '4' limit #{pages},6

SELECT count(0) FROM (SELECT ub.user_buy_id as orderId from user_market_buy_history ub where ub.purchase_uid = #{uid} and ub.order_state = '6' OR ub.sell_uid = #{uid} and ub.order_state = '6' UNION SELECT ut.user_trade_id as orderId from user_market_trade_history ut where ut.purchase_uid = #{uid} and ut.order_state = '4' OR ut.sell_uid = #{uid} and ut.order_state = '4' )t

select.if: SELECT ub.user_buy_id as orderId, ub.purchase_uid as purchaseUid, ub.quantity as quantity, ub.price as price, ub.sell_uid as sellUid, ub.order_state as state, ui.nickname as purchaseNickname, tem.nickname as sellNickname, ui.mobile as purMobile, tem.mobile as sellMobile FROM user_market_buy_history ub LEFT JOIN user_info ui on ui.uid = ub.purchase_uid LEFT JOIN user_info tem on tem.uid = ub.sell_uid WHERE ub.user_buy_id = #{id}
